About

I'm Tamara, a graphic designer based in Barcelona. I have been working in graphic design since 2008 when I finished my studies in the field. After years working on offline projects I fell inlove with interaction and the digital world, so I decided to specialize in UI/UX design. I enjoy learning from other professional profiles. I love lettering & typography.

Contact Me


2015

Made with Bootstrap and Jekyll.

Starting from the Freelancer theme.
